name: Lokum
description:
**Best Independent Mobile App in Turkey in 2015 According to indir.com**

Lokum is a puzzle game with cute characters which is based on real time physics.

Use the interactive objects around you and reach the flag, don't forget to pick up the stars!

9 cute characters option and 60 amazing levels
Every level has their own stunning music
Tons of missions waiting to be completed

Also Lokum means Turkish Delight, it's a dessert originated from Turkey.

Choose your character, use your hand coordination abilities and pass the levels. What are you waiting for?! Let’s play!
